import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import'./PokemonDetail.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PokemonDetail(){const{id}=useParams();const[pokemon,setPokemon]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPokemonDetail=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/${id}`);setPokemon(response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError('Failed to load Pokémon details');setLoading(false);}};fetchPokemonDetail();},[id]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error});}if(!pokemon){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No Pok\xE9mon data available."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pokemon-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pokemon.sprites.front_default,alt:pokemon.name,className:"pokemon-detail-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Height: ",pokemon.height/10," m"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Weight: ",pokemon.weight/10," kg"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Abilities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:pokemon.abilities.map((ability,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:ability.ability.name},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Stats"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:pokemon.stats.map((stat,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[stat.stat.name,": ",stat.base_stat]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Types"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:pokemon.types.map((type,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:type.type.name},index))})]});}export default PokemonDetail;
